name: CRAIG'S RAD VIDEO GAME FOR COOL PEOPLE
name_original: CRAIG'S RAD VIDEO GAME FOR COOL PEOPLE
description:
This the result of the last week working by my lonesome, a game about shooting weird alien things and going wicked fast!

There's a lot of things I wanted to add and polish up before releasing this, but alas, in the interest of time some features had to be cut. This is most apparent in the upgrade menu where you can max out both skills with the amount of points given to you at the start, the plan was to include more upgrades but like I said, time and such.

CONTROLS

A (Space) - Jump

B (L-CTRL) - Shoot

START (Enter) - Pause

CREDITS

Design & programming - Craig Tinney

Music - Ryan Callard

Various art assets - jerom

Pixel Camera - Ryan Nielson

Palette swapping - Broxxar
